best of all species.  I
like the image of the dragon drinking
on the pillars of many temples

there are also meaningful tattoos.
personal meaning My father passed away a few
months ago. He was the one who told me
about the myths and
cultural traditions surrounding
dragons, so I wanted to x the dragon image as a
connection to him.  John, a
tattoo artist who has followed the traditional dragon tattoo style for more than 10 years,
said that the dragon tattoo
will never go out of fashion.
Every year on the first day of February, the
people of a village in western
Michigan state  Mexico goes to the forest again to
worship ancestors and wish good luck for the
new year. Before the ceremony, purea villagers come
together to hold a ceremony to bring the fire to the mountain where
their ancestors are buried. The journey is
nearly 100 km long and the fire  This heaven is
kept by the villagers for M years
to stop the ancestral worship ceremony, which begins
at midnight right before February 1,
the first day of the new year according to the tailor's calendar.
Everyone burns the offerings and gets
together.  dancing next to the flickering fire.
We brought objects including
clothes and offerings here and then burned them
to send to our ancestors at the golden stream.
What I learned about the
pcha New Year festival was through him.
My grandmother We have tried to preserve
this festival and pass it on to the young people. Seeing
as more young people know and
celebrate the festival, we are very happy that this
tradition called fego nuevo or new fire
has existed since  many years but has only been
organized and maintained annually since

yemanja is often depicted as  a

she bestows goodness and luck on

of black people this festival is for
us to remind each other of our ancestral roots
of our cultural identity  The custom of worshiping the female
city of Yemanja was
brought to Brazil by West African slaves in the 16th century and is
believed to originate from
Eura culture. Since the beginning of this month, the
world's largest music company Universal music group
UMG has withdrawn all  The company's artists' music
is removed from the tiktok social network,
which means users will not be able to
use or listen to copyrighted songs
on tiktok by Universal artists,
including big names
like Taylor S adel or
drake The reason for the breakup
of umg and tiktok stemmed from
criticism that tiktok did not adequately pay
artists for using their music.
Besides, this platform also did not
guarantee the rights of artists.  In the
context of AI technology growing
rapidly, many singers' voices are being
used for personal purposes to gain
illegal profits. Tiktok reacted strongly to
umg's decision to cut ties with the company and at the same
time accused the company.  This Music has
greedy and self-serving actions, but it is
likely that the two sides will sit at the
negotiating table to come to an agreement that
benefits both. Tiktok has a
large number of users and is a place to help spread
the product.  artists' products as well as helping
many musical talents become
more known to the public, so
Universal's tough decision this time
may slightly affect the
album promotion plans of many singers in the near
future.

Ladies and gentlemen, this morning there was a serious traffic jam on
Chi Tho road, An Phu intersection,
Ho Chi Minh City
Long Thanh Dau Day expressway,
according to traffic jam records
starting at 8:00 a.m.  At more than 10 o'clock,
hundreds of cars still remained stuck on
Mai Chi Tho street, next to
Song Hanh expressway and Nguyen Thi
Dinh street, cars also had to move slowly
while motorbikes continuously climbed up.
According to traffic police, the cause of the
congestion is because this morning on
Ho Chi Minh City Long Thanh Dau Day Expressway, there was a
traffic accident between
four cars.  The accident happened right at the time when the
number of people departing from Ho
Chi Minh City to return home to celebrate Tet increased dramatically,
causing a serious impact on the traffic situation,
causing traffic jams for about 10
kilometers on the highway to regulate traffic.
On the highway, the authorities had to
apply a traffic separation measure to temporarily prevent
cars from entering the Ho Chi
Minh City Long Thanh Dau Expressway, so at the
An Phu intersection, there was intermittent congestion.
Congestion also occurred on
Ho Chi Minh City Trung
Luong Expressway lasting until this afternoon after a
traffic accident involving three
cars, in which at about 12 o'clock, three cars including
a truck and two cars crashed.  shrimp crashed into each other
on Ho Chi Minh City Trung

Initial investigation process. The police identified the suspect who committed the
robbery. He was a

At about 4:00 p.m. on February 1,

Lo town. Police named Ninh said that he had  Arrested the

dong. The arrested subject was Tran Minh Hiep, a

Collecting money from borrowers in Truong
Hoa commune, Hoa Thanh town,
the police confiscated 1.6 million VND, a
motorbike, five homemade knives, three pepper spray cans
and many other related items
from Hiep's testimony.  Yesterday, the police
arrested a related person,

worked with the authorities. Hiep
admitted that he had lent money to more than 900 people with a
total of more than 900 million VND, with an interest rate
of 60 million VND.  Monthly food, which is 720 monthly meals per year,
Hung helped Hiep collect
interest and was paid 200,000 VND. Currently,
the case has been handed over to
Hoa Thanh town police for further investigation and handling
through Soc province police.  Trang Destroyed a

afternoon in Di An city, Binh

collided with a car and was swept under the vehicle and
seriously injured around 1:45 p.m.  A female riding an
electric bicycle was riding on Ly Thuong Kiet street,
heading from intersection 550 to Di An market. When she arrived at
house number 391, she collided with a
seven-seat car driven by a male driver about 65 years old, who
turned around after the collision.
The car swept the female student and her bicycle
under it and climbed onto the sidewalk. Fortunately, the
driver was able to apply the brakes before the
vehicle crashed into the Tet flower seller. The

break two pieces.  The people's legs were pulled out and
